original_title: Lilli – ein Mädchen aus der Großstadt
overview: The frenzied reporter Lilli is just great: She shoots with both hands and lays her opponents with Jiu-Jitsu while the guys fall to the ground with just one look from her! Now she is to attend a missionary convention in Sicily. Nothing special? The apparently routine job develops into a murder case...
title: Lilli, a Girl From the Big City
